name: Healthy Juice Maker - Juicy Vegetable Smoothie with Orange, Apple, Carrot, Straw-Berry & Cream-y Fruit
name_original: Healthy Juice Maker - Juicy Vegetable Smoothie with Orange, Apple, Carrot, Straw-Berry & Cream-y Fruit
description:
Hey there you juice lovers!

Welcome to the Healthy Juice Maker! Here you can create awesome healthy juices from all kinds of delicious fruits!

Use all the different kitchen appliances and machines to make the healthy and hearty juice of your choice!

*Pssst! We packed in dozens of fun and funky decorations that you can use to customize your own special juice!
